values: 跳跃；跳跃着跑；弹跳；绑定；束缚；捆绑；固定；限定；约束；形成边界；反弹；回弹
界限；边界；限制；约束；界线；分界线；限度；范围
必定的；准备前往…的；正要去…的；受限制的；受约束的；装订的；有封面的；捆绑的；准备就绪的；界定的；有界限的

synonym.mean: 有义务的；受约束的；装有封面的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 保镖；巨大的东西；跳跃的人；吹牛者

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指两脚交替轻地跳或跨的动作。
指单脚短跳或双足猛力的动作。也指小鸟、青蛙等的跳。
更强调有力和弹跳的运动。
多指向前向上或向下跳跃、奔跳。
常可与jump换用，但侧重身体猛力向上升起并朝前急冲的动作，有时含突然的意味。
是普通用词，指用双脚向上跳，向下跳，或在同一平面上跳到有一定距离的某一点上，或跳过。

word_group.brief_definition: 不准进入；在(运动场地的)界线外, 越轨；超出容忍限度
与…有共同的境界；（因喜悦等而）雀跃；与…接界

bilingual.source: The deer bound gracefully through the forest.
bilingual.target: 鹿在森林中优雅地跳跃。

bilingual.source: The athlete bound over the hurdles effortlessly.
bilingual.target: 运动员轻松地跳跃过栏架。

bilingual.source: The dog bound towards its owner when called.
bilingual.target: 狗听到主人呼唤时跳跃着跑过去。

bilingual.source: A cougar can leap up to 18 feet in a single bound.
bilingual.target: 美洲狮可以一次跳跃18英尺。

bilingual.source: The children bound with joy when they saw the ice cream truck.
bilingual.target: 孩子们看到冰淇淋车时高兴地跳跃。
我们的花园到这里就到边际了。
他的耐心已经到了边际。

bilingual.source: Their efforts are bound to pay off.
bilingual.target: 他们的努力一定会得到回报。

list.abstract: bound（英[baʊnd]，美[baʊnd]），英语单词，作动词用，为跳动；跳跃着前进；形成界限。作名词用，为跳跃；界限；边界。作形容词用，为肯定会；准备到…去的；限制在某个场所的。短语搭配有bound up with（与…有密切关系的），例句为“But there are bound to be problems.（但肯定会有问题。）” bound形容词类近义词有controlled、liable，及物动词类近义词有chain、jump、dance，名词类近义词有region、extent、scope等，不及物动词类近义词有to limit、be confined to，相关反义词有unbind、untie、unbound等。

yingyinNormal.en: You might be bound by them right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可能现在就受限哦。（以下问题均出自"机器人三定律"）

yingyinNormal.en: Bound for greatness, destined to protect the people of New York.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因伟大而生，为保护纽约的人民而生 。

yingyinNormal.en: It's bound to be a risk on some level. You have to take a chance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不论如何，总会有些风险的，你得冒冒险才行。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm legally bound to present all offers. Wink, wink. Stop doing that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在法律上有义务把所有报价都提供给他。你懂的嘛。不要再这样说了。

yingyinNormal.en: They have access to infinite time and space, but they're not bound by anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们能通往无尽的时间和空间，但他们与现在没有任何联系。

yingyinNormal.en: Ugly grandchildren. But you're lovely. You're bound to produce little Imbeciles!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我担心的是生个丑孙子，但是你很可爱，你注定要生一个小…蠢货！

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter how far you might rise. At some point, you are bound to stumble.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论你有多么成功，难免会遇到失意之时。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, no, I made two copies and had them covered, reset and bound so that they wouldn't look like manuscripts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，不，我已经做成两本，装订好并添加了封面，那样看起来就不会像手稿。

yingyinNormal.en: Brian, speak. You're contractually bound to the show for another two years. Okay. All right, and if I refuse?
yingyinNormal.zh: 布莱恩，说话。你跟节目组签的合同还有两年才到期。好吧。好吧，如果我不演呢？

yingyinNormal.en: The minced prawns are bound together with salt, powdered chicken stock, potato flour and ground white pepper.
yingyinNormal.zh: 剁碎的虾仁加盐、鸡汤粉、土豆粉和白胡椒粉拌在一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, let me ask you this, when I learn that I'm a robot, would I be bound by Asimov's three laws of robotics?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我来问你，当我得知我是机器人，我要受限于阿西莫夫的"机器人三定律"吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I guess this is what we get for being with two testosterone-fueled alpha males. At some point, they're bound to lock horns.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜这就是我们跟两个荷尔蒙爆棚的雄性霸主在一起的后果，一山不容二虎，他们总有一天得角斗分生死。

yingyinNormal.en: These are the kind of little delicate compliments which are always acceptable to the ladies, and which I conceive myself particularly bound to pay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样巧妙的恭维话一般都会让太太小姐们听得高兴，我总觉得我应该在这方面特别留意。

yingyinNormal.en: Think about it, I'm about to live on a campus full of Alexes. That's bound to get annoying. And when it does, who better to deal with an Alex than you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 想想看，整个校园里都是艾丽克斯，一定会很让人抓狂的。到时候除了你还能有谁帮我应付艾丽克斯？

yingyinNormal.en: Over time, I leaned that by nature, most people's greatest strengths are also connected to their most significant weaknesses. And striving hard for big things is bound to lead you to painful falls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 慢慢的我发现从天性上来说，许多人最大的长处和他们最大的弱点相联系。为了高目标努力拼搏肯定会有跌痛的时候。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (be bound up with)与...有密切关系

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 弹起；反弹；碰撞；跳跃着前进；反射；被退回；迅速恢复；弹跳；不断地跳动
n. 分界线；边界；界限；击球超过边界线得分

word_family.mean: v. 跳动；跳跃着前进；形成界限；关；围入；限制；弹回；弹开；紧系 ； 紧拴 ； 固定；（bind的过去式和过去分词）

sense_info_list.en: certain or extremely likely to happen

examination_example.sentence: Someone is <highlight>bound</highlight> to point out that it amounts to the bare, bare minimum necessary to keep the Postal Service afloat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一定会有人指出，它仅仅等同于最最勉强、最低的必要方法来使得美国邮局得以维系下去。

examination_example.sentence: It had its origins in the great outdoors, but the results were as gallery-<highlight>bound</highlight> as the paintings of Turner and Constable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它起源于大自然，但最终却像特纳和康斯特布尔的画作一样，囿于画廊。

examination_example.sentence: Part of the problem is that the justices are not <highlight>bound</highlight> by an ethics code.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 部分问题在于法官不受道德规范的约束。

examination_example.sentence: The first shiploads of immigrants <highlight>bound</highlight> for the territory which is now the United States crossed the Atlantic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一艘满载移民的航船横跨大西洋，驶向这片土地，即当今的美国。

sense_info_list.zh: (be bound up with)与...有密切关系

examination_example.sentence: The recognition given to him for his work were all <highlight>bound</highlight> up with the class politics of the army at the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对他工作的认可都与当时军队的阶级政治有关。

word_usage.usage:
bound表示“一定的；必定的”时，只用作表语，常用句型be bound to do/be sth.一定会……/必然会……。例：
It's bound to be sunny again tomorrow.
明天肯定又是阳光灿烂。

bound指“ 正旅行去（某地）；准备前往（某地）”时，多用作表语和后置定语， be bound for （准备）去某地。例：
The ship was bound for Italy. 
这艘船驶向意大利。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 弹起；反弹；碰撞；跳跃着前进；反射；被退回；迅速恢复；弹跳；不断地跳动
n. 分界线；边界；界限；击球超过边界线得分

word_family.mean: v. 跳动；跳跃着前进；形成界限；关；围入；限制；弹回；弹开；紧系 ； 紧拴 ； 固定；（bind的过去式和过去分词）

sense_info_list.en: certain or extremely likely to happen

examination_example.sentence: Maybe students who choose less prestigious universities are <highlight>bound</highlight> to succeed because they are determined to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许选择不太有声望的大学的学生一定会成功，因为他们下定决心要成功。

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>bound</highlight> to cause endless disputes among nations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它必然会引起国家间无休止的争端。

examination_example.sentence: But there are <highlight>bound</highlight> to be problems.

sense_info_list.en: having a moral or legal duty to do something

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 多指向前向上或向下跳跃、奔跳。
指单脚短跳或双足猛力的动作。也指小鸟、青蛙等的跳。
是普通用词, 指用双脚向上跳, 向下跳, 或在同一平面上跳到有一定距离的某一点上, 或跳过。
常可与jump换用, 但侧重身体猛力向上升起并朝前急冲的动作, 有时含突然的意味。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。
